QuestData.Title: Striking First
QuestData.Description: The mogu are empowering some giant stone monstrosity up on the Golden Stair, with the sure intent of unleashing it upon us.$B$BHow about you go and let them know our opinion on the matter? Make sure the point strikes home.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stop the Shao-Tien Behemoth from being empowered.
